title: Japan Elegant Mountain Retreat with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Cocktail & Dining Credit
description:
Embrace the serene beauty of Japan's mountainous Nagano region with a stay at this stylish Karuizawa retreat. A favourite among the Japanese royal family, this stay lies in a nature-abundant resort town just an hour's train ride from Tokyo. Spend your days exploring the picturesque Kumoba Pond, known for its stunning autumn colours, or visit historic St. Paul's Catholic Church, a symbol of Karuizawa's Western influence.

For a deep dive into the delicious, KAGARIBI offers authentic, all-day Italian cuisine, from woodfired lasagne, to spaghettini aglio olio. After a day of exploration, retreat to the hotel's acclaimed spa for a rejuvenating treatment, or sip on a glass of locally produced wine as you admire the breathtaking views surrounding the property.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Karuizawa, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 18-39 Yashikizoe, Nagakura, Karuizawa-Machi, Kitasaku-Gun, Nagano 389-0111, Japan

title: Boutique Japan Retreat One Hour from Tokyo
description: Stay in Japan's widely applauded mountain retreat at Hotel Indigo Karuizawa, a boutique, design-driven escape perfectly perched by golf courses, hot springs and waterfalls. Make use of the 24-hour fitness centre or indulge in a treatment at the award-winning The Spa by HARNN. For a deep dive into deliciousness, KAGARIBI is an all-day authentic Italian restaurant - try the woodfired lasagne, gorgonzola and walnut gnocchi or Wagyu beef sirloin tagliata.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Karuizawa, an IHG Hotel
